casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Vincent Lamont HARRIS 548A04-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 17, 2019 Sonya M. Calloway-Durham, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC. Michele A. Goldman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Harris, Vincent Lamont. Michael D. Waters, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of July 2019 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of July 2019."
